articles.author: Anthony Ha
articles.title: Apple might be building its own AI ‘answer engine’ - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple is reportedly working to create a lightweight competitor to ChatGPT.
articles.content:
Apple has formed a new team to build a ChatGPT-like app, according to according to Bloombergs Mark Gurman.
This team reportedly called Answers, Knowledge, and Information is working to build an answ… [+614 chars]
